01000000 = Version 4 Byte

01 = InputCount 1 Byte

bf7c629c843cbd1bbefcb9edfd34ea04d7bc60073b5ca4f72078d08903eeeecd = TXID1 32 byte

4c000000 = TX VOUT 4 bytes

8c = SCRIPTSIG VARINT 

493046022100da21a6abf8a6ff1203fc1621542df89c4744cb66926c8853f4cb08ebfbf619fb022100e4ba8389e40afe2e1ed78e6ca5f4d60ba92a9a42b41750c3161cc157f1cb2e6c014104585d10790ce2cc89da52fe79ffb5b897c74736fd26064502878fe5e0167d42fe9e1f08abff0da5257712ccafd018c456f7e066b03800e1db1c3671fe048b7679 = SCRIPTSIG

ffffffff = SEQUENCE-NUM 4bytes
0280969800000000001976a9146a422a63e77af3560ea133ce377604766a6980ef88ac6ad06005000000001976a9147344b5b94753bc2ee1bf87aadbf757864d92d06d88ac00000000
